net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy
Class KaplanStrategy

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.AbstractStrategy
      net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.FixedQuantityStrategyImpl
          net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.FixedDirectionStrategy
              net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.KaplanStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventListener, net.sourceforge.jabm.strategy.Strategy, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Parameterizable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Prototypeable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Resetable, FixedQuantityStrategy, TradingStrategy, MarketEventListener
public class KaplanStrategy
extends FixedDirectionStrategy
implements java.io.Serializable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Prototypeable

An implementation of Todd Kaplan's sniping strategy. Agents using this strategy wait until the last minute before attempting to "steal the bid". See

"Behaviour of trading automata in a computerized double market market" J. Rust, J. Miller and R. Palmer in "The Double Auction Market: Institutions, Theories and Evidence" 1992, Addison-Wesley

Note that you must configure a report of type DailyStatsMarketDataLogger in order to use this strategy.

Parameters

base.s
double >= 0		 (the spread factor)
base.t
double >= 0		 (the time factor)

Version:
$Revision: 1.7 $
Author:
Steve Phelps
See Also:
DailyStatsReport, Serialized Form

Field Detail

t

protected int t
The time factor. Kaplan will bid if the remaining time in the current period is less than t.

protected double s
The spread factor.
